description:
Ted is bent on finding Cherish, the only mamodo that he looks upon as a family. One day in the city, he smells something that is suspected to be her. Ted and Zatch search everywhere and every suspected people, but it is eventually a mistake. However, Ted deeply believes that one day he will find her...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Ted no Blues, Kaze no Naka no Shoujo, Unmei no Saikai
Ted`s Blues, The Girl in the Wind, Fate`s Reunion
テッドの哀歌[ブルース] 風の中の少女 運命の再会
